metadata.title: Tarevity - Streamline Your Productivity with Smart Task Management
metadata.description: Transform how you organize daily work with Tarevity's intuitive task management.

structuredData.description: A modern task management application that helps professionals organize their work and increase productivity.

hero.title: Manage your tasks efficiently
hero.description: Organize your tasks, set priorities, and never forget important deadlines again. A simple and efficient way to increase your productivity.

features.heading: Features
features.subheading: Everything you need to stay organized

feature1.title: Simple task management
feature1.description: Add, edit, and mark tasks as completed with ease. Intuitive and user-friendly interface.

feature2.title: Never miss a deadline
feature2.description: Set due dates for your tasks and stay in control of your commitments.

feature3.title: Secure and private
feature3.description: Your tasks are stored securely. Login with GitHub and Google for greater convenience.

feature4.title: Access from anywhere
feature4.description: Responsive design that works on all devices. Your tasks are always within reach.

cta.description: Sign up for free and try all features of Tarevity.

metadata.defaultTitle: Tarevity - Intelligent Task Management for Modern Professionals
metadata.description: Elevate your productivity with Tarevity's secure, intuitive task management platform featuring priority-based workflows and comprehensive analytics.
metadata.keywords: task management, productivity system, priority management, deadline tracking, project organization, to-do list app, work management, task tracking

errorBoundary.errorMessage: We apologize for the inconvenience. Please try refreshing the page.
errorBoundary.toastMessage: An unexpected error occurred. Please try refreshing the page.

agreement.title: Agreement to Terms
agreement.paragraph1: These Terms of Use constitute a legally binding agreement made between you, whether personally or on behalf of an entity ("you") and Tarevity ("we," "us" or "our"), concerning your access to and use of the Tarevity task management application.
agreement.paragraph2: By accessing or using the application, you agree to be bound by these Terms of Use. If you disagree with any part of the terms, you may not access the application.

userAccounts.title: User Accounts
userAccounts.paragraph1: When you create an account with us, you guarantee that you are above the age of 13, and that the information you provide us is accurate, complete, and current at all times. Inaccurate, incomplete, or obsolete information may result in the immediate termination of your account on the application.
userAccounts.paragraph2: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account and password, including but not limited to the restriction of access to your computer and/or account. You agree to accept responsibility for any and all activities or actions that occur under your account and/or password.
userAccounts.paragraph3: You must notify us immediately upon becoming aware of any breach of security or unauthorized use of your account.

intellectualProperty.title: Intellectual Property
intellectualProperty.paragraph1: The application and its original content, features, and functionality are and will remain the exclusive property of Tarevity and its licensors. The application is protected by copyright, trademark, and other laws of both the United States and foreign countries. Our trademarks and trade dress may not be used in connection with any product or service without the prior written consent of Tarevity.
intellectualProperty.paragraph2: You retain ownership of any intellectual property rights that you hold in the content you create and store on Tarevity. By uploading content to Tarevity, you grant us a worldwide, non-exclusive, royalty-free license to use, reproduce, adapt, publish, translate, and distribute your content in any existing or future media. This license is for the purpose of operating and improving our services only.

prohibitedUses.title: Prohibited Uses
prohibitedUses.intro: You may use our application only for lawful purposes and in accordance with these Terms. You agree not to use the application:
prohibitedUses.item1: In any way that violates any applicable federal, state, local, or international law or regulation.
prohibitedUses.item2: For the purpose of exploiting, harming, or attempting to exploit or harm minors in any way.
prohibitedUses.item3: To send, knowingly receive, upload, download, use, or re-use any material that does not comply with these Terms.
prohibitedUses.item4: To transmit, or procure the sending of, any advertising or promotional material, including any "junk mail," "chain letter," "spam," or any other similar solicitation.
prohibitedUses.item5: To impersonate or attempt to impersonate Tarevity, a Tarevity employee, another user, or any other person or entity.
prohibitedUses.item6: To engage in any other conduct that restricts or inhibits anyone's use or enjoyment of the application, or which, as determined by us, may harm Tarevity or users of the application, or expose them to liability.

userContent.title: User Content
userContent.paragraph1: Our application allows you to create, store, and share content such as tasks, descriptions, and other materials (collectively, "User Content"). You are solely responsible for your User Content and the consequences of posting or publishing it.
userContent.paragraph2: By providing User Content, you represent and warrant that:
userContent.item1: You own or have the necessary licenses, rights, consents, and permissions to use and authorize us to use all intellectual property rights in and to any User Content.
userContent.item2: Your User Content does not violate the privacy rights, publicity rights, copyrights, contractual rights, intellectual property rights, or any other rights of any person or entity.
userContent.item3: Your User Content does not contain any material that solicits personal information from anyone under the age of 18 or exploits people under the age of 18 in a sexual or violent manner.
userContent.item4: Your User Content does not violate any applicable law concerning child pornography, or otherwise intended to protect the health or well-being of minors.

externalLinks.title: Links to Other Websites
externalLinks.paragraph1: Our application may contain links to third-party websites or services that are not owned or controlled by Tarevity.
externalLinks.paragraph2: Tarevity has no control over, and assumes no responsibility for, the content, privacy policies, or practices of any third-party websites or services. You further acknowledge and agree that Tarevity shall not be responsible or liable, directly or indirectly, for any damage or loss caused or alleged to be caused by or in connection with the use of or reliance on any such content, goods, or services available on or through any such websites or services.
externalLinks.paragraph3: We strongly advise you to read the terms and conditions and privacy policies of any third-party websites or services that you visit.

termination.title: Termination
termination.paragraph1: We may terminate or suspend your account and bar access to the application immediately, without prior notice or liability, under our sole discretion, for any reason whatsoever and without limitation, including but not limited to a breach of the Terms.
termination.paragraph2: If you wish to terminate your account, you may simply discontinue using the application or request account deletion through the application's settings.
termination.paragraph3: All provisions of the Terms which by their nature should survive termination shall survive termination, including, without limitation, ownership provisions, warranty disclaimers, indemnity, and limitations of liability.

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer
disclaimer.paragraph1: Your use of the application is at your sole risk. The application is provided on an "AS IS" and "AS AVAILABLE" basis. The application is provided without warranties of any kind, whether express or implied, including, but not limited to, implied warranties of merchantability, fitness for a particular purpose, non-infringement, or course of performance.
disclaimer.paragraph2: Tarevity, its subsidiaries, affiliates, and its licensors do not warrant that a) the application will function uninterrupted, secure, or available at any particular time or location; b) any errors or defects will be corrected; c) the application is free of viruses or other harmful components; or d) the results of using the application will meet your requirements.

liability.title: Limitation of Liability
liability.paragraph1: In no event shall Tarevity, nor its directors, employees, partners, agents, suppliers, or affiliates, be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages, including without limitation, loss of profits, data, use, goodwill, or other intangible losses, resulting from (i) your access to or use of or inability to access or use the application; (ii) any conduct or content of any third party on the application; (iii) any content obtained from the application; and (iv) unauthorized access, use, or alteration of your transmissions or content, whether based on warranty, contract, tort (including negligence), or any other legal theory, whether or not we have been informed of the possibility of such damage.

changes.title: Changes to Terms
changes.paragraph1: We reserve the right, at our sole discretion, to modify or replace these Terms at any time. We will provide notice of changes to these Terms by posting the updated terms on the application with the "Last updated" date revised accordingly. What constitutes a material change will be determined at our sole discretion.
changes.paragraph2: By continuing to access or use our application after any revisions become effective, you agree to be bound by the revised terms. If you do not agree to the new terms, you are no longer authorized to use the application.

governingLaw.title: Governing Law
governingLaw.paragraph1: These Terms shall be governed and construed in accordance with the laws of Europe, without regard to its conflict of law provisions.
governingLaw.paragraph2: Our failure to enforce any right or provision of these Terms will not be considered a waiver of those rights. If any provision of these Terms is held to be invalid or unenforceable by a court, the remaining provisions of these Terms will remain in effect.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.paragraph1: If you have any questions about these Terms, please contact me:

commitment.title: Our Commitment to Privacy
commitment.description: At Tarevity, we take your privacy seriously. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, disclose, and safeguard your information when you use our task management application. Please read this privacy policy carefully. If you do not agree with the terms of this privacy policy, please do not access the application.

personalData.title: Personal Data
personalData.description: While using our application, we may ask you to provide us with certain personally identifiable information that can be used to contact or identify you. Personally identifiable information may include, but is not limited to:

usageData.title: Usage Data
usageData.description: We may also collect information on how the application is accessed and used ("Usage Data"). This Usage Data may include information such as your device's IP address, browser type, browser version, the pages of our application that you visit, the time and date of your visit, the time spent on those pages, unique device identifiers, and other diagnostic data.

usage.title: How We Use Your Information
usage.description: We use the collected data for various purposes:

items.provide: To provide and maintain our service
items.notify: To notify you about changes to our service
items.analysis: To gather analysis or valuable information so that we can improve our service
items.monitor: To monitor the usage of the service
items.technical: To detect, prevent and address technical issues

cookies.title: Cookies and Tracking Technologies
cookies.description1: We use cookies and similar tracking technologies to track activity on our application and store certain information. Cookies are files with a small amount of data which may include an anonymous unique identifier. Cookies are sent to your browser from a website and stored on your device.
cookies.description2: You can instruct your browser to refuse all cookies or to indicate when a cookie is being sent. However, if you do not accept cookies, you may not be able to use some portions of our application.

session.title: Session Cookies:
session.description: We use Session Cookies to operate our service.

preference.title: Preference Cookies:
preference.description: We use Preference Cookies to remember your preferences and various settings.

security.title: Security Cookies:
security.description: We use Security Cookies for security purposes.

security.title: Data Security
security.description1: The security of your data is important to us, but remember that no method of transmission over the Internet, or method of electronic storage is 100% secure. While we strive to use commercially acceptable means to protect your Personal Data, we cannot guarantee its absolute security.

items.breach: Password breach checking via HIBP API

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Authentication Providers
thirdParty.description1: Our application allows you to sign in using third-party authentication providers, such as Google and GitHub. When you choose to sign in using one of these services, we may collect personal information that your privacy settings on that service permit us to access.
thirdParty.description2: We only use this information for authentication purposes and to create your user profile within our application. We do not share this information with additional third parties without your consent.

rights.title: Your Data Rights
rights.description: Depending on your location, you may have certain rights regarding your personal information, such as:

items.access: The right to access personal information we hold about you
items.correction: The right to request correction of inaccurate data
items.deletion: The right to request deletion of your data

rights.contact: To exercise any of these rights, please contact us using the information provided below.

changes.title: Changes to This Privacy Policy
changes.description1: We may update our Privacy Policy from time to time. We will notify you of any changes by posting the new Privacy Policy on this page and updating the "Last updated" date.
changes.description2: You are advised to review this Privacy Policy periodically for any changes. Changes to this Privacy Policy are effective when they are posted on this page.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: If you have any questions about this Privacy Policy, please contact me:

theme.label: Theme
theme.description: The theme affects how Tarevity appears to you. The dark theme is ideal for night use and can reduce eye strain. The light theme provides better visibility in well-lit environments. The system option automatically follows your device preferences.

management.deletingMessage: We are processing your request. This may take a few moments.

deleteAccount.secondConfirmDescription: This is a permanent action. All your tasks and data will be lost. Do you want to continue?

Manifest.name: Tarevity - Task Management
Manifest.description: Elevate your productivity with Tarevity's secure, intuitive task management platform

metadata.title: Create New Task | Tarevity
metadata.description: Create a new task, add details, set priority level, and schedule due dates.

metadata.title: Task Details | Tarevity
metadata.description: View task details, update status, edit information, or share with team members.

metadata.title: Edit Task | Tarevity
metadata.description: Modify task details, update due dates, change priority levels, or edit descriptions.

metadata.title: Terms of Service & User Agreement | Tarevity
metadata.description: Review our detailed terms of service covering user responsibilities, data ownership, acceptable use policies, and service limitations.
metadata.keywords: terms of service, user agreement, legal terms, data ownership

metadata.title: Personalize Your Experience | Tarevity Settings
metadata.description: Customize your task management environment with theme preferences, notification settings, and account security options.

metadata.title: Your Profile & Productivity Statistics | Tarevity
metadata.description: Review your personalized task analytics, completion metrics, and account settings. Gain insights into your productivity patterns.

metadata.title: Data Protection & Privacy Commitment | Tarevity
metadata.description: Understand how Tarevity safeguards your data with end-to-end encryption, secure storage practices, and transparent usage policies.
metadata.keywords: data privacy, information security, user data protection, privacy policy

metadata.title: Your Productivity Dashboard | Tarevity
metadata.description: Access your personalized Tarevity command center. Filter tasks by priority and status, track completion metrics, and maintain productivity momentum.

metadata.title: Task Calendar | Tarevity
metadata.description: Stay organized and productive with Tarevity. Use the task calendar to manage your schedule, prioritize tasks, and track your progress effectively.
metadata.keywords: Tarevity, task calendar, productivity, task management, schedule tracking

metadata.title: Create New Password | Tarevity Security Center
metadata.description: Set a new secure password with real-time strength assessment and breach verification. Your security is our priority at Tarevity.

metadata.title: Create Your Tarevity Account | Simple Registration
metadata.description: Join thousands of productive professionals. Create your account with enterprise-grade security, password strength verification, and data breach protection.

metadata.title: Secure Login | Tarevity
metadata.description: Access your task management dashboard securely. Multiple authentication options including passwordless login via Google and GitHub.

metadata.title: Recover Account Access | Tarevity Password Reset
metadata.description: Securely reset your password through our encrypted recovery system. Receive time-sensitive recovery links via email verification.

metadata.title: Page Not Found | Tarevity
metadata.description: Oops! The page you're looking for doesn't exist. Return to the main dashboard or explore other features of Tarevity.
